00003 def exists(env):
00004         return true

00006 def generate(env):
00007 
00008         from SCons.Options import Options
00009         import os
00010 
00011         optionFile = env['CACHEDIR'] + 'fam.cache.py'
00012         opts = Options(optionFile)
00013         opts.AddOptions(
00014                 ('CACHED_FAM', 'Whether the FAM library is available'),
00015                 ('CXXFLAGS_FAM',''),
00016                 ('LINKFLAGS_FAM',''),
00017                 )
00018         opts.Update(env)
00019         if not env['HELP'] and (env['_CONFIGURE_'] or not env.has_key('CACHED_FAM')):
00020                 conf = env.Configure( )
00021                 if conf.CheckCXXHeader('fam.h') and conf.CheckLib('fam','FAMOpen'):
00022                         env['CXXFLAGS_FAM']= ['-DHAVE_FAM']
00023                         env['LINKFLAGS_FAM'] = ['-lfam']
00024                         env['CACHED_FAM'] = 1;
00025                 else:
00026                         env['CACHED_FAM'] = 0;
00027                         print 'FAM not found.'
00028 
00029                 env = conf.Finish()
00030                 opts.Save(optionFile, env)
